page.title: 1121 BRIDGE ROAD ICKFORD
page.content:
Some of the houses in Ickford are quite old .My house is 365 years old.It is one of the oldest in the village.My house used to be two houses but now it is one big house. It was built for the workmen of the manor in Little Ickford. It is a timber and brick house with a thatched roof. The feature of the house is the Herringbone brick work.It has small windows and low doorways.Inside most of the beams are exposed.Some of the beams are of ships timber and some still have their bark on.There is a well in the garden.
BY NEIL SMITH.
